description: T1	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)	Remove 4 low hanging limbs, back to main stem. Final height unchanged = 17m and final unchanged spread = 12m.T2	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	Remove 3 low hanging limbs, back to source. Reduce large overhanging limb by 3m. Remove overhanging deadwood. Final height unchanged = 15m and final unchanged spread = 10m.T3	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	Remove 3 low hanging limbs, back to source. Reduce large overhanging limb by 3m. Final height unchanged = 15m and final unchanged spread = 10m.T4	Whitebeam (Sorbus aria)	Remove 4 low hanging limbs, back to source. Reduce remaining overhanging limbs by 1.5-2m. Final height unchanged = 10m and final unchanged spread = 18m.T5	Crack Willow (Salix fragilis)	Remove 4 low hanging limbs, back to source. Final height unchanged = 10m and final unchanged spread = 8m.T6	Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)	Remove 1 low hanging limb, back to source. Final height unchanged = 17m and final unchanged spread = 12m.T7	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	Remove 2 low hanging limbs, back to source. Final height unchanged = 15m and final unchanged spread = 10m.T8	Cherry (Prunus spp)	Reduce to previous reduction points, removing approx 2m. Final height unchanged = 5m and final unchanged spread = 4m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
